function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Economic breakdown in iran due to sanctions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases in crowded cities due to interactions in social and professional settings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in urban soundscape due to capitalism","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anti-density discourse may reinforce overcrowding in homes due to insane rents.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in urban soundscape due to social distancing and lockdown measures.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in city soundscape due to covid-19 containment measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of people in the city due to containment measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stereotypical representations of city sounds and environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of attention to complexities, ironies, and potentialities of modernity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rigid polarities and flat totalisations in twentieth-century thinking","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of geographical sensibility in spatial storytelling","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of dialogue between individual contributors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of communication and dialogue in organizing cities and lives","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of podcasting and radio as research dissemination methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity and interaction with various individuals during the podcast project.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Personal and immediate contributions may lead to a lack of academic rigor in addressing contagious disease propagation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anxiety and self-reflection can affect the ability to objectively analyze and address consideration for contagious disease transmission during audio recording","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration for privacy and consent during recording","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interpreting vague instructions leading to different interpretations of the task","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of the task leading to off-topic submissions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of covid-19 being used as a context for contributions without explicit request","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discussion of covid-19 pandemic and academic experts’
